\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 68066}

\subsection*{Unexpected High}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Ajaxx}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 450 mg & oral & Pharms - Pregabalin & pill / tablet\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 172.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
After being prescribed Lyrica for some time now, I have just come to the realization that this drug can actually produce a very euphoric feeling.  I Decided tonight to take a higher dose than I normally do to see what effect it might have on me.  So far I am very pleased.  It produces an effect similar to a high dose of valium.  Kind of like the first time I ever tried a Benzo.  My moter function is completly lost as I wander around with a cloud like feeling of floating.  Things seem to be a lot more funny to me than when not taking the drug, like I'm giggling at everything for no reason.  It's quite fun.

\end{document}
